headline: Postcard from Carbis Bay: ‘Cornwall’s overtourism problem will be exacerbated by the G7’
claim_text: Built in 1894, the 125-acre family-owned estate gained popularity among Victorian travellers, who arrived by rail, and it has attracted the well-heeled ever since.
